statements: DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours >= 3 AND course_name LIKE '%Math%';
DELETE FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 101 AND schedule_day = 'Monday';
DELETE FROM CatalogInformation WHERE catalog_id = 201 AND topic = 'Mathematics';
DELETE FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 101 AND instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Registration WHERE student_id = 201 AND course_id = 101 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM course_schedule WHERE professor_id = 101 AND schedule_day = 'Monday';
DELETE FROM student WHERE student_id = 201 AND student_email = 'test@email.com';
